page.title: 01STRATHNAIRN'S LAKE DISTRICT
page.content: About three quarters of our area is covered by loch or rugged hillside.It is popular with tourists and with those who live in Inverness who like to get out into the country to fish,climb rocks or walk on the hills. Eighteen houses are lived in by fifty one people.Ten of them are children. the nearest primary school is at Farr and secondary school in Inverness. There are thirteen retired people, five who work on the area's farms and thirteen who work in Inverness. The minister of the Church of Scotland at Dunlichity lives seven miles away at Daviot. The churchyard holds many of the people who lived in the area since 1763.Only two of these families remain.In fact ten of the families have lived here for less than ten years.
